title: Riot you need to hotfix yasuo now
body: As the title says yasuo is too broken to be played right now. This is so bad that he deserves a hotfix and should not wait until patch 9.4

replies.body: Statistics really aren't showing that. A bit strong, sure, but not close to being hotfix worthy. Barely above 50% with a play rate that actually went *down* with the newest patch by over a percentage point.
Doesn't ban rate also take in effect? Like if a champion is being banned in 3/4 of all the games (76.25%), it means something is definitely wrong and should be dealt with immediately

No.

Especially on a champion like Yasuo where people don't like him simply because they don't want to put in the (incredibly simple) effort to learn how to play against him.

Also I believe there was a Yasuo hotfix within the first 24 hours after the crit items were changed in s8 because he wasn't as strong. Since the items were reverted to what they were prior to that change, wouldn't it be logical to do the same procedure to Yasuo?

New PD isn't as good on him as it was before. IE has less crit damage than before.

I've had multiple cases where I've shut him down in laning phase, but he comes back after getting a kill while roaming. It's too easy for him to comeback when hes behind. He should at least be focused more as a feast or famine champ where if he has a bad laning phase, he shouldn't be able to pop off mid to late game

"I could go in for lopsided trades and move around his windwall the entire game whilst having to watch out for his snowball no matter how far behind he is as his kit allows him to be relevant no matter what, or I could just, like, not."


-people who have played against one of the most popular champs dozens (if not hundreds) of times, but like, don't want to do so again
21.5% Popularity and a 52.6% Win rate and a whopping 66.3% ban rate. So Yasuo mains cant play their champ in most games because of this issue.... Do you see the problem.
